00052 /* ******************** editmesh_utils.c */
00053 
00054 /*
00055  * ok: the EDBM module is for editmode bmesh stuff.  in contrast, the 
00056  * BMEdit module is for code shared with blenkernel that concerns
00057  * the BMEditMesh structure.
00058  */
00059 
00060 /*calls a bmesh op, reporting errors to the user, etc*/
00061 int EDBM_op_callf(struct BMEditMesh *em, struct wmOperator *op, const char *fmt, ...);
00062 
00063 int EDBM_op_call_and_selectf(struct BMEditMesh *em, struct wmOperator *op,
00064                              const char *selectslot, const char *fmt, ...);
00065 
00066 /* same as above, but doesn't report errors.*/
00067 int EDBM_op_call_silentf(struct BMEditMesh *em, const char *fmt, ...);
00068 
00069 /* these next two functions are the split version of EDBM_op_callf, so you can
00070  * do stuff with a bmesh operator, after initializing it but before executing
00071  * it.
00072  *
00073  * execute the operator with BM_Exec_Op */
00074 int EDBM_op_init(struct BMEditMesh *em, struct BMOperator *bmop,
00075                  struct wmOperator *op, const char *fmt, ...);
00076 /*cleans up after a bmesh operator*/
00077 int EDBM_op_finish(struct BMEditMesh *em, struct BMOperator *bmop,
00078                    struct wmOperator *op, const int report);
00079 
00080 void EDBM_flag_disable_all(struct BMEditMesh *em, const char hflag);
